TopicTitle: Decouplers/Separators not separating from activated engines

Articles.Content:
Decouplers/Separators will not properly separate from an engine if the engine was activated before separation. this will mainly happen when the engine and decoupler are in the same stage.

A workaround i found is to have the decouplers and engines in there own stage one after another instead of in the same stage.
when i decouple my lander from inside my cargo bay it says the vessel was destroyed. i can go back using the tracking station but then the parts are coupled but i cant try to decouple again.
I was doing a manouver to orbit Kerbin, then after pressing space to detach the previus stage, the ship sticked together and even after starting the engine it didn't move/increase its speed.

There is a confirmed bug, that when you put decoupler and engine into the same stage, the lower stage won't detach.

Put them into seperate stages or decouple manually.

And please don't crop your pictures.

Edited February 27, 2023 by Carraux
A number of threads have been merged.
